MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 postcode area of Flint, affecting properties in Albert Ave, Tir Digonedd and surrounding streets.  We are aware of the previous power cuts this morning affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers onsite have confirmed a fault on the underground cable. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12noon on Jan 16, 2020
